text: Kodi wina wa inu angakonde kukhala ndi munda wa tende ndi azitona womwe umathiriridwa ndi mitsinje pansi pake ndipo uli ndi zipatso zosiyanasiyana, pamene ukalamba wampeza, pomwe iye ali ndi ana opanda mphamvu ndipo munda uja uli kukunthidwa ndi mphepo ndipo mâ€™kati mwa mphepoyo muli moto umene utentha mundawo?
